## Location

### Connectors

Location module exposes the following connectors into the global r communication object:

-   r\$filter_country_choices: vector, contains the list of countries from the (unfiltered) location items

### Event Observers

Location module has observers taking dependencies on the following connectors:

-   r\$map_click: event displays a popup on the map
-   r\$filter_country: event applies filter on the selected locations

### Other dependencies

-   r\$proxymap: to update the map with markers
-   r\$map_click: used to add new location
